amendment.description: An amendment numbered 93 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit the District of Columbia from using federal or local funds to require that students in elementary or secondary schools receive a COVID-19 vaccination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
